Range:
Trellix Phishing Simulator
LICENSE: Per User
DELIVERABLE: SaaS with Email Security Cloud or Email Security Cloud AntiVirus/AntiSpam
CONTENT: Trellix Phishing Simulator add-on for Email Security Cloud (EMCL) or Email Security Cloud AntiVirus/AntiSpam (EMCA). The datacenter for this SKU will match the customer’s Email Security Cloud instance.
MANAGEMENT: From within Email Security Cloud console
RESTRICTIONS: Order Quantity must match base Email Security Cloud or Email Security Cloud AntiVirus/AntiSpam SKU
NOTE:  Trellix-M IAM hosted only
REQUIREMENTS: Add-on Feature for customers with EMCL Email Securty Cloud Edition or EMCA Email Security Cloud Antivirus/AntiSpam.
NOTE: EMCLVX Email Security for Office 365 already includes this feature in its bundle.

Email Security for Office 365
LICENSE: Per User
DELIVERABLE: SaaS with activation email
CONTENT: Email Cloud with AntiVirus/AntiSpam functionality, IVX Enterprise Cloud and Trellix Phishing Simulator
MANAGEMENT: Both Email Cloud and IVX Enterprise Cloud have own console
RESTRICTIONS: Minimum New Sale Order Quantity is 250 Users
NOTE: Trellix-M IAM hosted only. Customers purchasing on a Per-User basis may use the Product for up to twenty (20) submissions per User per month of the Product Term, aggregated across all of Customer’s Users. "Submissions" are files or other artefacts submitted to the Product by Customer for processing. Users here refers to the employee count of the organization.

Email Security Server Edition(T)
LICENSE: Per User
DELIVERABLE: Activation email
CONTENT:  Hermes base Subscription. Activation keys for Agents, DTI Content and Support for Email On-prem.
REQUIREMENTS:  Quotes and Orders must additionally include the required number of deployment option physical/virtual appliances  - for corresponding appliance activation keys.
Hermes Email Virtual Appliance Deployment Options

Email Security Sensor Virtual(T)
LICENSE: Per Appliance Instance
DELIVERABLE: Virtual appliance image. Virtual appliance image contains activation code.
CONTENT: Performance up to 1250 unique attachments per hour
REQUIREMENTS: Only for including as a VM deployment option for customers with a base Hermes Email Server Edition subscription.
NOTE: Sensor requires VX (virtual execution) in any form factor.

Description: EM Virt Appl Sensor SW PERP LIC(T)

Range:
Email Security Virtual 16 Core Appliance(T)
LICENSE: Per Appliance Instance
DELIVERABLE: Virtual appliance image, which runs on VMWare Hypervisor. Virtual appliance image contains activation code.
CONTENT: Performance up to 350 unique attachments per hour.
REQUIREMENTS: Only for including as a VM deployment option for customers with a base Hermes Email Server Edition subscription.
NOTE:  Virtual appliance is an integrated appliance like any physical appliance. No separate IVX (intelligent virtual execution) is needed.
